ingredients: 1 cup whole wheat pastry flour,   +   1/2 cup old-fashioned rolled oats, 2 teaspoons baking powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt,   +   1/4 cup canola oil, 1  egg, lightly beaten,   +   1/4 cup honey,   +   1/4 cup white sugar, 1 cup diced fresh figs
nutrition: Total Fat 8g 10%, Saturated Fat 1g 4%, Cholesterol 21mg 7%, Sodium 276mg 12%, Total Carbohydrate 31g 11%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 18g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 1mg 3%, Calcium 89mg 7%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 114mg 2%
